author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I am looking for examples and/or information on donor drives as opposed to food drives.  Instead of asking for one-time contributions of food, volunteers (Neighborhood Coordinators) enlist their neighbors to become long-term Food Donors.  Each donor is provided a bag which is collected every 2 months.  This ensures a sustainable supply of food.
An example of what I'm looking for is the Ashland, OR Food Project:  http://www.ashlandfoodproject.com/
Any help is greatly appreciated.
title: Donor Drives:  Sustainable Food Drives
